title: Your store is bugged, Riot.
body: I have enough IP to get Rakan (7869) and yet it says I do not have enough IP. What's wrong w/ y'all?

replies.body: It looks like your balance was showing the wrong info.  I resync'd your account, so it should show the correct balance now.  You might have to relog, and it's actually a little bit less than what it was showing on your screen.  Let me know if that clears things up!
